author: claherre
title: Set from a distant past...
review:
A small crane, from that era when the minifigs couldn't sit inside the truck or the crane cabin. Even as a kid I was confused with this issue. Anyway, the highlight with this set is the crane itself, you can operate it, so the playability is there. The minifig is a generic worker of that era, with the yellow jacket with stickers, and for me, this brings memories of summer days playing withi this set and two others I had with similar minifigs.

Pros:

- The crane

- Minifig

 

Cons:

- Minifig can't sit inside any cabin
